page.title: 16THE SCHOOL ENVIRONMENT
page.content:
HOUGHTON REGIS UPPER SCHOOL
BUILDINGS,FACILITIES,EQUIPMENT The School opened in 1973. Our buildings are arranged in 3 main blocks : they are modern, purpose built and very well maintained.
The facilities of the school are excellent, ranging from the heated Indoor Pool and large Sports Hall to a superb Library equipped with modern Information Technology facilities.
The School has modern equipment in many areas e.g. video, computing, sciences, business studies, sports, music, drama and many more.
